page.title: 06Entertainment-Adults
page.content: Most entertainment in our block is organised by the people themselves for their own entertainment,rather than being organised by outside comp- anies.Much of this activity is also fund raising for some good causes. Coffee evenings,cheese and wine part- ies,Domino,Whist and Beetle drives, Barn dances,Discos,Bingo and sponsored events are all fund raising,fun events. Many people try to keep fit as well as enjoying themselves with activities like Squash,Badminton,Tennis,Aerobics and there are quite a few Weight Watchers. The Womens Institute plays a large part in activites for ladies in area. They have talks,slide shows,sports, outings and take part in local fairs. Visits to the pub and various hobb- ies also fill many leisure hours.
